Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: brahim4you
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel, the location is excellent and close to all the famous places. the room is a bit small but clean and the staff is very nice. Very nice hotel, the location is excellent and close to all the famous places. the room is a bit small but clean and the staff is very nice. Very nice hotel, the location is excellent and close to all the famous places. the room is a bit small but clean and the staff is very nice.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent in every way”
Reviews.Author: Mun M
Reviews.Content: This hotel proved it's worth in every way. Itslocation is it's best point. Conveniently located within walking distance (and i am not exagerrating) from the chief tourist points - Hagia Sofia, The Hagia Sofia museums, Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace & Museum and the Grand Baazar and the tramline to the rest of the city -- what more can a visitor want, or expect. The hotel is very clean, provides excellent breakfast and the staff is very very helpful. The hotel is located near eateries and shops and provides an excellent place to lodge, especially if you are on a budget. I would recommend this place any day!

Reviews.Title: “A nice little hotel in prime location.”
Reviews.Author: ALG89
Reviews.Content: The main benefit with this hotel is its location. We walked to all the main tourist spots from here and there are a great number of restaurants in the area. Only negative is that the rooms are extremely small but for a short stay this is not important. The rooms are cleaned every day and fresh towels are given. Excellent service plus the added bonus of free wifi.

Reviews.Title: “Great boutique hotel”
Reviews.Author: Arturo M
Reviews.Content: This is my first time commenting at tripadvisor. i was so happy with the service of this hotel that I wanted to join and comment. The hotel is literally in the heart of the historical peninsula where all the historical palaces, mosques, the Hagia Sophia and the Grand Bazaar are located. you are basically meters away from all these beauties. The hotel is a small boutique hotel. the breakfast is magnificent. most of all, the manager Cagkan and the other employees are so friendly and helpful. They even do their best for even things that they are not obliged to help. I thank them all once more for all their help and friendly manner.

Reviews.Title: “perfect”
Reviews.Author: terry c
Reviews.Content: perfect hotel , very near to historical area,very clean,very friendly,pretty boutiqe hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Very handy for the sights.”
Reviews.Author: CountryStroller
Reviews.Content: This is a very friendly, well-run hotel. The rooms are comfortable and well equipped. The breakfasts are really special, with lots of variety and an effort to offer something different every day.You can find plenty of interesting places to eat within easy reach in the surrounding streets in the evenings. Probably the best feature is that you are five minutes walk from the Hippodrome, Hagia Sophia, Sultan Ahmet Mosque,Yerebatan Sarnici, the Turkish and Islamic museum, Topkapi Palace and many other sights. You can visit something in the morning and pop back to the hotel to freshen up before the next one.

Reviews.Title: “A beautiful alternative”
Reviews.Author: Klaus B
Reviews.Content: This cute hotel was recommended by friends and they were absolutely right. A very nice and cosy hotel located near to several musts of Istanbul. The rooms are new designed in a traditional style. Very friendly and helpful service. Breakfast is delicious and each morning freshly prepared. This clean and cosy hotel is the alternative to boring touristic hotels. Next time we will be back again.

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly adequate hotel”
Reviews.Author: Hannah_2912
Reviews.Content: The hotel is within walking distance of the key historial places of interest, so excellent location and also very close to the Metro stop if you want to travel further afield. Despite the small size of the hotel rooms and ensuites, the room was clean and equipped with all the usuals. Having AC was great. Comfy beds too. Very friendly and relaxed staff who were on hand to give advice. Breakfast was very good and provided us with a good start to each day of our trip. Other guests had said the hotel was romantic, which I wouldn't necessarily agree with!

Reviews.Title: “Great boutique hotel in a fantastic location”
Reviews.Author: becs_c
Reviews.Content: I had a great stay at the Istanbul Inn, starting when I arrived off an overnight flight at 7.30am and my room was already available. The rooms are quite small, but extremely clean and tidy and my bed was super comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel together with a vey good location”
Reviews.Author: AlihandirO
Reviews.Content: I recommend this hotel to all that wants to get away from the big chain hotels ad stay in a hotel with character and warmth in an excellent location. Nice and clean rooms and good service made our stay memorable.

Reviews.Title: “Convenience and peace of mind”
Reviews.Author: radhidas
Reviews.Content: Cozy, very comfortable hotel with everything you would need on a trip away from home (such as safe, hair dryer, wifi, tv, airport transfer). Awesome location - no more than 10 mins walk to any of the important sights in Sultanahmet. Great breakfast. Very friendly, fun and helpful staff who went out of their way to answer questions and sort out any problems we had - and were always good for a chat!

Reviews.Title: “Super Location in the center of the old city!”
Reviews.Author: minesota55
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located in the center of the old city, by walking it takes 2mn to Mosque Blue and Saint Sophie.I stayed for nights there and enjoyed my stay and highly recommend this hotel for those who want to feel the real Ä°stanbul.Also, I want to express that the room was clean and the bed was comfortable,It was just a new hotel so every thing was new.If you compare the price and the value you will see that this hotel is a best choise.

Reviews.Title: “...”
Reviews.Author: eligolli
Reviews.Content: This is about the nicest hotel we have stayed at in Europe. The staff went out of their way to help us. The location is perfect, we walked to every single attraction.Located in the heart of Sutanahmet. All major tourist attractions, Blue Mosque, Hagia Sofia,Topkapi Palace and the under ground water system(Bacilica Cistern) are within 2 - 3 minutes walking distance. City's Tramway is at couple of minutes away. The rooms were impeccable. The breakfast was wonderful. Our transfer (one way is free) was seamless. If you are going to Istanbul, look no further, this is your place.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel in the heart of the city”
Reviews.Author: OlyaKotik
Reviews.Content: The hotel has a perfect location, right in the centre of Istanbul, near to Aya Sofya, Blue Mosque, etc.. So if you travel to see the attractions, it's a nice place to stay. The hotel also has a good breakfast, it's clean, the rooms are not big, but in the room you can find some nice oriental details (like a nice tray and beautiful box for tea, 'golden' pillows, so on). The personnel were always ready to help, but they were not initiative. So you always had to ask first, but as soon as you ask they were always ready to explain and solve your problem. The hotel has a free wi-fi in rooms, but you have to ask for the code. I think this hotel is good for tourists, and it's good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice and cozy place in perfect location!”
Reviews.Author: fruehstueckspause
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for four nights for sightseeing. The small hotel is located in a remodeled Ottoman house, located just one block from Hagya Sofia. Rooms are quite small, but very cozy. Remodelling was done recently, so everything was in very good condition. The room was spotlessly clean, everything (including heating) was working ok. Buffet breakfast was good and Turkish standard. The staff was friendly and always available, although they had problems organizing a second blanket. Overall: This is an excellent place to stay if you want to see Istanbul's sights. Very good value, very romantic.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value (for Istanbul) in excellent location”
Reviews.Author: broughhouse
Reviews.Content: My partner and I stayed for three nights. The staff were all helpful and courteous: when two small problems (how to operate the room safe, how to access the free wi-fi) were encountered,staff responded quickly and things were sorted out. As has been commented on, the rooms are small and ours had no view to speak of. The window could be opened, the heating worked (it was chilly in Istanbul in late March!) Location is excellent for the Sultanahmed area, about 200 metres from Gulhane and Sultanahmed tramway stops. Breakfast was of a good standard. Turkish tea was offered as well as juice and fresh (machine) brewed coffee. A wide variety of bread, simits, small cakes, plus the usual salami/cheese/cucumber/tomato/boiled eggs. A good start to the day. All in all, we would unhesitatingly stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “A warm and nice place, with kind staff”
Reviews.Author: ancient75
Reviews.Content: I have stayed for 4 nights, and it was a good experience with this hotel. Luckily i found the chance to make a city trip, going araund was very easy it is really in a central spot.

Reviews.Title: “i'll be happy to visit it again on my next trip to istanbull”
Reviews.Author: AntoniaAra
Reviews.Content: nights whilst visiting Istanbul. The room was clean Breakfast has lots of choice, freshly baked bread, fruits, cheeses etc.. the staff is helpful and friendly. This hotel is idealy situated for visiting the old town, short walking distance from Ste Sophia, the blue Mosque, the Bazaar, spice market etc... Event hough we arrived before check in time, the manager was generous to offer us to join their buffet breakfast. The staff was also always ready to recommend "things to do" but never pushy to arrange anything. Becos of this attitude I asked for a recommendation of a travel agent for travel outside Istanbul - and they were very professional. The hotel always smelled clean and the rooms were always clean when coming back from a long day out. They have no problems with storing luggage at their premises while we travelled to other regions. Depending on how fast you walk, the Ä°stanbul inn is located 10mins walk to the Hippodrome and there is a laundry mat uphill and good neighbourhood.

Reviews.Title: “istanbul inn is a very clean....”
Reviews.Author: aydinaydin
Reviews.Content: istanbul inn is a very clean, comfortable, and friendly hotel with a great location. Walking distance to major sites in the old city. The staff was very accomodating and helpful, and we felt very comfortable. When we return to Istanbul we would return to the Daphne. Since we would return to this hotel, that says it all.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, clean and modern rooms, although small and very kind personell!”
Reviews.Author: Basres
Reviews.Content: Been for one night to Istanbul. Stayed at the Instanbulinn, a very small hotel with just nine rooms. Hotel is recentenly renovated, and rooms are clean and modern, although small. Fine for just one person, but kind of cramped for a couple. The three rooms at the back have no view (look out on a small innerplace), the other six rooms look out on the street. The personell is extremely friendly. Helped me carry the lugage I had, I was able to get in the room at 11 am, although check-in is normally only at 1 pm and they arranged the transfer to Ataturk airport! Would seriously recommed this place, excellent to explore the city since it's just around the Topkapi Palace, the Haga Sophia and the Basilica Cisterne.

Reviews.Title: “The best place I've ever been”
Reviews.Author: MaxH2345
Reviews.Content: I've only been in Istanbul for short term, but it was an amazing time there: Nice and interesting people, a lot of exiting cultural stuff and - of course - a great nightlife. My stay in Istanbul wasn't only enriched by the city itself but also by the accomodation: the Istanbul Inn was the perfect place to stay - clean and freindly rooms, a very comfortable bed, amazing location and, of course, friendly and professional staff. What more could a tourist expect from a hotel? I highly recommend to stay in the Istanbul Inn for having a very comfortable time there!!

Reviews.Title: “mental and physical comfort, feel like at home”
Reviews.Author: oksanamalenko
Reviews.Content: best location, clean rooms, nice breakfast, VERY FRIENDLY staff. for that prize we had more that we could expect because of staff. I strongly recomend

Reviews.Title: “the best!”
Reviews.Author: martwaa
Reviews.Content: that hotel is great! it has great location, nice rooms, friendly and kind service and reception. hotel and scene is very clean. You should try it. i had great vacation! :D

Reviews.Title: “Amazing hotel to stay”
Reviews.Author: agisitan_
Reviews.Content: Best trip ever!!! Great location, cozy and clean rooms (comfy beds), friendly and helpful staff, quiet and peaceful environment... I also recommended it to my parents and they loved it... Behnam the receptionist was very kind and friendly, willing to help us about everything.. Dont hesitate to ask for suggestions (where to go, what to do.. etc..) you ll get the taste of "local" life...

HotelInfo.Name: Istanbul Inn
HotelInfo.Address: Alemdar Mahallesi Alaykosku Caddesi No:10 | Sultanahmet, Old City, Istanbul, Turkey
